text: Miranda is an unincorporated community in Faulk County, in the U.S. state of South Dakota. ==History== Miranda was platted in 1886. The community was named for the mother of a railroad official. Miranda contained a post office from 1887 until 1985. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Faulk County, South Dakota Category:Unincorporated communities in South Dakota
title: Miranda, South Dakota
